Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at 100th/Yates
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 100th, Bensley, 99th and Yates: due to, street blockage near 100th/Yates.
